required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effect of Rocuronium on the Acute Hypoxic Ventilatory Response in Patients With Obstructive Sleep Apnea
clinical_study.official_title: Effect of Partial Neuromuscular Blockade by Rocuronium on the Acute Hypoxic Ventilatory Response in Patients With Obstructive Sleep Apnea-before and After Three Month CPAP Treatment. A Non-randomized, Non-blinded Study.

brief_summary.textblock: This study describe the effect of partial neuromuscular blockade of rocuronium on the acute hypoxic ventilatory response in patients with OSA before and after 3 month of CPAP treatment.

clinical_study.study_design: Intervention Model: Single Group Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Supportive Care

primary_outcome.time_frame: At baseline, with CPAP, at TOF 0.70 and at TOF >0.90. At diagnosis and after 3 month of CPAP treatment at home

secondary_outcome.time_frame: At baseline, with CPAP, at TOF 0.70 and at TOF >0.90. At diagnosis and after 3 month of CPAP treatment at home
At diagnosis and after 3 month of CPAP treatment at home

secondary_outcome.measure: Hypoxic ventilatory response during acute CPAP treatment
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At diagnosis and after 3 month of CPAP treatment
At diagnosis and after 3 month of CPAP treatment at home

secondary_outcome.measure: Hypercarbic ventilatory response during acute CPAP treatment
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At diagnosis and after 3 month CPAP treatment at home
At TOF 0.70 and TOF >0.90. At diagnosis and after 3 month CPAP treatment.

arm_group.description: Intravenous infusion of rocuronium with the goal of TOF 0.70 and >0.90

intervention.description: Partial neuromuscular blockade with rocuronium with a TOF 0.70

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Male with diagnosed moderate OSA (AHI 15-30), untreated, but planned for CPAP treatment. Healthy except for OSA and well controlled tablet treated hypertension where the treatment has not been changed during the last 3 month. None smokers. 18-70 years old. BMI <35.
Exclusion Criteria:
- If they donÂ´t fit the inclusion criteria

overall_official.affiliation: Karolinska University Hospital and Karolinska Institutet

facility.name: Department of Anesthesiology, Surgical Sciences and Intensive Care Medicine, Karolinska University Hospital
